1.0.0.name: wordpress/sitemap
1.0.0.description:
Code moved to page-list plugin Please, delete Sitemap plugin and install Pagelist plugin. Don't be afraid, the functionality of these plugins is the same.

Page-list | all Page-list params | Donate

shortcodes:

  • [pagelist] - hierarchical tree of all pages on site (useful to show sitemap of the site);
  • [subpages] - hierarchical tree of subpages to the current page;
  • [siblings] - hierarchical tree of sibling pages to the current page;
  • [pagelist_ext] -
